amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of the Special Envoy to Iran Robert Malley to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
